mapper.select:
select count(1) from ( select cname as cname,
arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(website_app_name)),',') as websiteAppName, arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(company_short_name)),',') as companyShortName, arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(domain_name)),',') as domainName, arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(domain_website_app_name)),',') as domainWebsiteAppName, arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(domain_company_short_name)),',') as domainCompanyShortName,
website_app_name as websiteAppName, company_short_name as companyShortName, domain_name as domainName, domain_website_app_name as domainWebsiteAppName, domain_company_short_name as domainCompanyShortName,
sum(net_out_parse_flow_total) as netOutParseFlowTotal , sum(net_out_parse_total_cnt) as netOutParseTotalCnt, sum(parse_total_cnt) as parseTotalCnt , sum(parse_success_cnt) as parseSuccessCnt, sum(parse_flow_total) as parseFlowTotal , sum(net_in_parse_flow_total) as netInParseFlowTotal, sum(net_in_parse_total_cnt) as netInParseTotalCnt , sum(within_parse_total_cnt) as withinParseTotalCnt , sum(without_parse_total_cnt) as withoutParseTotalCnt from ${queryTable} 1=1
group by cname
,website_app_name , company_short_name , domain_name , domain_website_app_name , domain_company_short_name
)

select cname as cname,
arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(website_app_name)),',') as websiteAppName, arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(company_short_name)),',') as companyShortName, arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(domain_name)),',') as domainName, arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(domain_website_app_name)),',') as domainWebsiteAppName, arrayStringConcat(arrayDistinct(groupArray(domain_company_short_name)),',') as domainCompanyShortName,
website_app_name as websiteAppName, company_short_name as companyShortName, domain_name as domainName, domain_website_app_name as domainWebsiteAppName, domain_company_short_name as domainCompanyShortName,
sum(net_out_parse_flow_total) as netOutParseFlowTotal , sum(net_out_parse_total_cnt) as netOutParseTotalCnt, sum(parse_total_cnt) as parseTotalCnt , sum(parse_success_cnt) as parseSuccessCnt, sum(parse_flow_total) as parseFlowTotal , sum(net_in_parse_flow_total) as netInParseFlowTotal, sum(net_in_parse_total_cnt) as netInParseTotalCnt , sum(within_parse_total_cnt) as withinParseTotalCnt , sum(without_parse_total_cnt) as withoutParseTotalCnt from ${queryTable} 1=1
group by cname
,website_app_name , company_short_name , domain_name , domain_website_app_name , domain_company_short_name
order by ${orderByStr} limit #{queryParam.offset}, #{queryParam.limit}

when.test: queryParam.domainMerge != null and queryParam.domainMerge != '' and queryParam.domainMerge==1
